name: From TV Animation - One Piece: Treasure Wars 2 Welcome to Buggyland
summary: One Piece: Treasure Wars 2 Welcome to Buggyland is a board game for the Wonderswan handheld based on the manga and anime series One Piece. It was developed, released, and published in December 2002 by Bandai.
storyline: The story is loosely based upon the East Blue Saga. The Straw Hat Pirates challenge Buggy and his crew to a race in order to find the treasure.

alternative_names.name: トレジャーウォーズ2 バギーランドへようこそ
